# nlohmann/json

This directory contains the nlohmann/json library - a modern C++ JSON library.

## About

nlohmann/json is a header-only C++ library for JSON parsing and serialization.

- **Website**: https://github.com/nlohmann/json
- **License**: MIT
- **Version**: Latest from develop branch

## Installation

The library is automatically included when building AzerothCore.

## Usage

Simply include the header in your C++ code:

```cpp
#include <nlohmann/json.hpp>

using json = nlohmann::json;
```

## Update

To update the library to the latest version, run:

```bash
curl -o deps/nlohmann/nlohmann/json.hpp https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlohmann/json/develop/single_include/nlohmann/json.hpp
```
